Additional Notes 

![][image9]Remaining Balance Clause   
Patients understand that this payment, **“Patient Payment”** does not cover the full length of the treatment.To complete the full treatment, the remaining balance must be paid upfront. I acknowledge and agree to these terms for my treatment. 

Clause 

*Oral health treatment is an excellent investment in your medical and psychological well-being. It is understood that financial considerations are always part of deciding what works best for you. We advise that you have a financial plan in place to account for the fee involved with your treatment.* 

**Lab Fee:** 

A $10,000 non-refundable fee is charged once records are submitted to the lab. This fee was discussed with me and I agree to pursue treatment at this time. 

*I have read and understood the office financial policy. I am responsible for payment of all fees for myself or my dependents. **There is a 5-year Peace of Mind Guarantee contingent on coming for regular oral health appointments every 6 months**.* 

*I have read and agreed to all terms discussed in this agreement.*
